flawed_nl_solution:
There are 60 minutes in an hour so 1 hour 20 minutes = (60+20) minutes = 77 minutes
He will spend a total of 77+10 = <<77+10=87>>87 minutes
87 minutes is = (60/60) hours and 27 minutes = 1 hour 27 minutes = 0130 in 24-hr time
He has to leave 0127 hours earlier than 0900 i.e. 0900-0127 = 0733 hours
#### 0733

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 80, not 77. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
